hypothesis_content.title: BTC Daily RSI Oversold Bounce in Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades in NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 50%) and its daily RSI(14) falls below 35, a long position will generate positive alpha with a 5% profit target within 3 days, as institutional dip-buying and spot ETF flows provide support.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often exhibit range-bound behavior. BTC's RSI dipping below 35 in such environments has historically triggered mean reversion bounces, amplified by spot ETF buying and algorithmic support levels.
entry_conditions: BTC price > 20-day simple moving average (to filter severe downtrends)

exit_conditions.time_exit: 3 days after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If average return after 3 days is ≤ 0% across 20+ signals in backtest, or win rate < 55%.
